title: ‘Corpo chains’ doomed unless they embrace crypto's ethos: StarkWare CEO
contentSnippet: StarkWare CEO Eli Ben-Sasson said corporate blockchains will help with mainstream adoption, but long term, they will be abandoned if they try to retain control.

title: Canadian province to ban new crypto mining connections
contentSnippet: British Columbia is moving to ban new crypto mining connections to protect its Hydro power grid. For years, analysts have argued this is the wrong approach.

title: How to turn crypto headlines into trade signals with ChatGPT
contentSnippet: Crypto traders can use ChatGPT to decode crypto headlines and generate actionable trade setups — fast, flexible and surprisingly accurate (subject to human verification).

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: Coinbase Tells US Treasury Old AML Rules Are 'Broken,' Pushes Tech Fixes for Crypto Crime
contentSnippet: Coinbase wants AI safe harbors, blockchain analytics recognition, and zero-knowledge proof adoption to replace outdated compliance systems.

title: Bitcoin Braces for First Inflation Test Since US Shutdown
contentSnippet: Analysts expects a measured market reaction to Friday's CPI report, noting that tariff concerns and labor data outweigh the inflation print.

title: Polygon boss says he’s been ‘questioning his loyalty’ toward Ethereum
contentSnippet: Polygon’s Sandeep Nailwal slammed the Ethereum community for underappreciating Polygon’s role in the Ethereum ecosystem, prompting a response from Vitalik Buterin.

title: 片山さつき氏、財務大臣に起用　暗号資産規制整備にも期待
contentSnippet: 片山さつき氏が新財務相に就任。1988年に財務省入省後、金融政策や暗号資産規制、税制改革に関与してきた実績が注目されている。

title: X、ユーザーネーム市場を開設し最高100万ドルで販売開始
contentSnippet: Xがプレミアム会員向けにユーザーネーム市場を開設し、非アクティブなユーザーネームを最高100万ドルで販売すると報じられた。無料の「プライオリティ」と有料の「レア」の2種類を提供する。

title: CRYPTO BOUNCES BACK, ALTCOINS BELOW FTX LEVELS, CPI THIS WEEK
contentSnippet: Crypto Bounces After Hitting Extreme Fear Sentiment. Spot Btc Etf Suffer Ath Weekly Outflows. Revived Btc Supply Hits Highest Since January. Tough to Be Bullish With Btc Below $112k: Ansem. Top 50 Alt

title: 株価大幅下落のソラナ・カンパニー、私募株ロックアップ解除を予定通り実施へ
contentSnippet: パンテラ・キャピタルが支援するソラナ・カンパニーは、株価下落する中、私募株のロックアップ解除を予定通り実施すると発表。「絆創膏を一気に剥がす」アプローチで、市場の圧力に対処する方針を示した。

title: Coinbase to US: Embrace blockchain if you want to fight crime on it
contentSnippet: Chief legal officer Paul Grewal said in his letter to the US Treasury Department that money laundering schemes have become increasingly sophisticated and law enforcement needs advanced technologies to

title: Crypto’s next bear market will have a brand-new trigger: Willy Woo
contentSnippet: Analyst Willy Woo warned the next crypto bear market could be driven by a business cycle downturn, last seen in 2008, before Bitcoin was invented.

title: ナスダック上場グリーンレーン、165億円調達でベラチェーン（BERA）戦略を開始
contentSnippet: 米グリーンレーン・ホールディングスが1.1億ドルの私募増資を実施し、仮想通貨BERAの保有戦略を開始すると発表した。ポリチェーン・キャピタル主導で上場企業として最大規模のベラ保有者を目指す。

title: Solana Company Touts Conviction as Investors Gain Right to Sell Shares
contentSnippet: he Solana DAT firm says its resale registration is a show of confidence in its Solana-linked treasury strategy, even as HSDT shares fall.

title: US gov shutdown ‘likely’ to end this week: Trump adviser
contentSnippet: White House adviser Kevin Hassett says the US government shutdown will likely end this week, which could restart crypto regulatory progress.

title: Dogecoin’s House of Doge bets on Italian soccer underdog
contentSnippet: Dogecoin Foundation’s commercial arm has acquired a majority stake in US Triestina 1918 in a push for broader DOGE adoption, starting with sports.

title: アマゾンAWSの大規模障害、コインベースやロビンフッドにも影響
contentSnippet: アマゾンAWSの障害で仮想通貨取引所コインベースや取引アプリのロビンフッドに一時不具合が発生した。集中型クラウドへの依存リスクが改めて浮き彫りになった。

title: パンプファン、ミームコインローンチ市場を再び支配　日次1.5億円収益維持＝報道
contentSnippet: ミームコインローンチパッドのパンプファンが市場シェア95%を獲得し独占状態に。市場低迷下でも日次1.5億円の収益を維持。圧倒的な卒業数と強固な回復力を示す。

title: ユーザー数5500万人突破、Web3ソーシャルインフラ「UXLINK」のCEOが描くマスアダプションへの道
contentSnippet: UXLINK CEOローランド・サフォー・ンタゲ氏の独占インタビュー。Telegram基盤で5500万ユーザーを抱えるWeb3ソーシャルインフラの戦略と日本市場への期待を聞いた。

title: カナダの州政府、AI電力制限と仮想通貨マイニング恒久禁止を提案
contentSnippet: カナダのブリティッシュコロンビア州が人工知能データセンター向けの電力供給を制限し、新規の仮想通貨マイニングプロジェクトを恒久的に禁止する法案を提出したと報じられた。

title: Asia’s Stablecoin Race Sees Top Companies Vie for Dominance, Test Policy Lines
contentSnippet: Japan’s banks plan a ¥1 trillion stablecoin, Singapore’s rules are maturing, and China tightens control as Asia’s strategies diverge.

title: BitMine’s Lee says Ether’s ‘price dislocation’ is a signal to buy
contentSnippet: BitMine chairman Tom Lee said he expects Ethereum to enter a supercycle, making the current price an attractive risk vs reward purchase.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Bitcoin Holds Steady as Market Resets After Leverage Flush
contentSnippet: Glassnode says last week’s selloff “cleared out excess without breaking structure,” while Enflux points to renewed institutional layering from Blockchain.com’s SPAC and Bitmine’s $800 million ETH buil

title: BTC採掘企業ビットディアの株価目標上方修正、ベンチマークがAI事業を評価
contentSnippet: ベンチマークが仮想通貨ビットコイン採掘企業ビットディアの目標株価を大幅に引き上げた。AI事業の社内化により収益創出が加速すると予測している。

title: Senate Republicans Call for Own Meeting With Crypto CEOs After Democrats' Sitdown
contentSnippet: GOP lawmakers are scheduling a followup meeting with crypto CEOs after they meet this week with Senate Democrats on the market structure bill, sources say.

title: 「イーサリアムには押し目買いの傾向」CoinSharesが先週の資金流動結果を公開
contentSnippet: CoinSharesは、先週の仮想通貨投資商品への資金フローは約5.1億ドルの純流出だったと公表。イーサリアムの投資商品では押し目買いが見られたが、ビットコインの投資商品に相殺されたと指摘している。

title: X to Launch Handle Marketplace, Prices Rare Usernames Up to Seven Figures
contentSnippet: X's new marketplace lets Premium subscribers claim inactive usernames, with rare handles priced up to seven figures.

title: Dogecoin Firm House of Doge Acquires Controlling Share in Italian Soccer Club
contentSnippet: House of Doge, the Dogecoin Foundation's commercial arm, is betting big on a European soccer club from Italy's Serie C league.

title: Solana Co-Founder Vibe Codes Hyperliquid Rival, Invites Devs to ‘Steal Idea’
contentSnippet: Solana’s Yakovenko said he was just “messing around” with AI and never meant for the code to be public.

title: Bitcoin Bounce Stalls as XRP, Zcash Lead Gains; Arca Says Rally Not a Dead-Cat Bounce
contentSnippet: The rebound in crypto prices won't be short-lived as key market metrics show signs of recovery, Arca analysts said in a Monday note.

title: Bitcoin Market Flips Bullish: Do the Charts Align With Sentiment?
contentSnippet: Three days ago, traders were betting Bitcoin would crash to $100K. Now the odds have reversed—but do the charts agree?

title: She Asked ChatGPT for Powerball Numbers—Then Won $100K
contentSnippet: The Michigan Lottery confirmed the big ChatGPT-assisted Powerball win, but stressed that AI cannot predict random lottery results.

title: Pantera-Backed Solana Company Brings Forward PIPE Unlock as Stock Price Plunges 60%
contentSnippet: The firm said it is "ripping the band-aid off" by allowing early investors to sell shares  ahead of schedule.

title: AAVE Bounces Over 10% in Strong Weekend Recovery Amid RWA Integration Plans
contentSnippet: Onchain capital allocator Grove shared plans to boost Ripple USD, USDC stablecoin liquidity on Aave's institutional lending arm Horizon for tokenized asset-backed borrowing.

title: Centralized Exchanges Are Still Criminals’ Favorite Crypto Money Laundering Tool
contentSnippet: Focusing regulatory energy on mixers while letting exchanges remain the primary fiat gateways for illicit funds is like locking the windows while leaving the front door wide open, argues Dr. Jan Phili

title: Crypto's Half-finished Legislative Agenda Teeters as CEOs Set Meeting With Democrats
contentSnippet: Some of the top digital assets execs are heading to a meeting this week with U.S. Senate Democrats to see about getting the market structure bill moving.

title: Monad’s Fast EVM Chain Promises ‘Night and Day’ Performance Gains
contentSnippet: CoinDesk sat down with Monad Foundation’s Head of Growth Kevin McCordic to talk about the architecture behind the blockchain.

title: Quantum Computing Is 'Biggest Risk to Bitcoin,' Says Coin Metrics Co-Founder
contentSnippet: Nic Carter says quantum computing is bitcoin’s biggest risk, explaining how spending exposes public keys and urging developers to plan post-quantum defenses.

title: Ripple-Backed Firm Plans SPAC, Raising $1B to 'Create the Largest Public XRP Treasury'
contentSnippet: A new Ripple-backed public vehicle is planned to buy XRP on the open market and pursue yield strategies.
